sentences.english: It is the second kind of Styloctenium mindorensis known.
sentences.chinese: 它是已知的第二種花面狐蝠品種。

sentences.english: Fruit bats of the Pteropodidae family are the natural hosts of Hendra virus.
sentences.chinese: 狐蝠科的果蝠是亨德拉病毒的天然宿主。

sentences.english: The natural host of the virus has been identified as being fruit bats of the Pteropodidae Family, Pteropus genus.
sentences.chinese: 經確認，狐屬狐蝠科的果蝠是這一病毒的天然宿主。

sentences.english: The natural host of the virus are fruit bats of the Pteropodidae Family, Pteropus genus.
sentences.chinese: 狐屬狐蝠科的果蝠是這一病毒的天然宿主。

sentences.english: Fruit bats of the Pteropodidae family are the natural host of Nipah virus.
sentences.chinese: 狐蝠科的果蝠是尼帕病毒的天然宿主。

sentences.english: It seemed the only alternative was to use the flying fox.
sentences.chinese: 唯一的選擇似乎是用狐蝠。

sentences.english: But the volunteers had not used it in this type of situation.
sentences.chinese: 但是，志願兵從未在這種情況下使用過狐蝠。

sentences.english: The most optimistic estimates put the population of flying foxes in peninsular Malaysia at 500, 000.
sentences.chinese: 據最樂觀的估計，馬來西亞半島狐蝠約50萬隻。

definition: vulture/(bird species of China) griffon vulture (Gyps fulvus)
(bird species of China) grey heron (Ardea cinerea)
